title: Sivir Buff
body: I think that Sivir is underplayed because of her weak ult. I was thinking of some buffs for it and I thought of 3 different buffs. one could be ignore unit collision. If some crazy person started sprinting at me I think I would step out of the way, so why don't the minions. the second is it could be like in mario where you get the 3 mushrooms, so she can activate her ult 3 times, but a weaker buff. the third option could be that she and her team get a move speed buff, then little move speed pads spawn, if an ally step on them they get the move speed buff.

>
> I think that Sivir is underplayed 

what drugs are you smoking
In majority of my games I never see Sivir played, or banned, or hovered over, or even considered. I agree that she's underplayed, but it may differ from division to division, tier to tier.

You don't see her TOO much in Solo Q but I wouldn't call her underplayed

But she is super duper heavily major contested in pro play.

>because of her weak ult

Are you kidding me?

With one button, Sivir can win her team the game.

Her ult is honestly fine. I personally only like the first buff as it can be applicable to almost everytime I've used it, usually a teammate gets minion blocked and therefore the ult is useless. It's kinda dumb how that already wasn't implemented into her ult..
yeah the other two were to make sivir a bit more interesting, but removing unit collision is a way to make her ult a bit more useful without too much change.
the last thing we need is a buff to that retarded champion.
